Properties.ProtectedString:
local MOUSE_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunCursor.png' local RELOADING_ICON = 'rbxasset://textures/GunWaitCursor.png'
local Tool = script.Parent
local Mouse = nil
local function UpdateIcon() if Mouse then Mouse.Icon = Tool.Enabled and MOUSE_ICON or RELOADING_ICON end end
local function OnEquipped(mouse) Mouse = mouse UpdateIcon() end
local function OnChanged(property) if property == 'Enabled' then UpdateIcon() end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(OnEquipped) Tool.Changed:connect(OnChanged)

--Made by Luckymaxer
Tool = script.Parent Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle")
Slash = Tool:WaitForChild("Slash") Swing = Tool:WaitForChild("Swing") HoldOut = Tool:WaitForChild("HoldOut")
SlashSound = Handle:WaitForChild("SlashSound") HitSound = Handle:WaitForChild("HitSound") SwingSound = Handle:WaitForChild("SwingSound")
Players = game:GetService("Players") Debris = game:GetService("Debris") RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
Equipped = false AttackReady = true SwingReady = true
BaseDamage = 0 SlashDamage = 15 SwingDamage = 30
Damage = BaseDamage
ReloadTime = 1
Last_Attack = 0
Grips = { Slash = CFrame.new(0, 1.75, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0.00042643919, -0.999999881, 0, 0.999999881, 0.00042643919, 0), Hold = CFrame.new(0, 1.5, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0.999999762, -0.000818330271, 0, 0.000818330387, 0.999999642, -0) }
NunchuckSwirl = Handle:Clone() NunchuckSwirl.Size = Vector3.new(3, 3,0.2) NunchuckSwirl.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.5, 1.5, 2) NunchuckSwirl.Mesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=159710546" NunchuckSwirl.Mesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=159710634"
function FindCharacterAncestor(Parent) if Parent and Parent ~= game:GetService("Workspace") then local humanoid = Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid then return Parent, humanoid else return FindCharacterAncestor(Parent.Parent) end end return nil end
function TagHumanoid(humanoid, player) local Creator_Tag = Instance.new("ObjectValue") Creator_Tag.Name = "creator" Creator_Tag.Value = player Debris:AddItem(Creator_Tag, 2) Creator_Tag.Parent = humanoid end
function UntagHumanoid(humanoid) for i, v in pairs(humanoid:GetChildren()) do if v:IsA("ObjectValue") and v.Name == "creator" then v:Destroy() end end end
function Blow(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent and Handle.Transparency < 1 then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if character and character ~= Character and humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and Humanoid.Health > 0 then local right_arm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") if right_arm then local joint = right_arm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") if joint and (joint.Part0 == Handle or joint.Part1 == Handle) then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(Damage) HitSound:Play() end end end end end
function Attack() Spawn(function() AttackReady = false Damage = SlashDamage Tool.Grip = Grips.Slash SlashAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Slash) if SlashAnim then SlashSound:Play() SlashAnim:Play() end wait(ReloadTime) SlashSound:Stop() Damage = BaseDamage Tool.Grip = Grips.Hold AttackReady = true end) end
function DoubleClick() Spawn(function() SwingReady = false AttackReady = false Handle.Transparency = 1 SwingAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(Swing) local LeftArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") local RightArm = Character:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") local NunchuckSwirls = {} if LeftArm then LeftNunchuckSwirl = NunchuckSwirl:Clone() LeftGrip = Instance.new("Weld") LeftGrip.Part0 = LeftArm LeftGrip.Part1 = LeftNunchuckSwirl LeftGrip.C0 = CFrame.new(0, -1, 0, 1, 0, -0, 0, 0, 1, 0, -1, -0) LeftGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, -0.300000012, -0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, -1) LeftGrip.Parent = LeftNunchuckSwirl table.insert(NunchuckSwirls, LeftNunchuckSwirl) Debris:AddItem(LeftNunchuckSwirl, 5) LeftNunchuckSwirl.Parent = Character end if RightArm then RightNunchuckSwirl = NunchuckSwirl:Clone() RightGrip = Instance.new("Weld") RightGrip.Part0 = RightArm RightGrip.Part1 = RightNunchuckSwirl RightGrip.C0 = CFrame.new(0, -1, 0, 1, 0, -0, 0, 0, 1, 0, -1, -0) RightGrip.C1 = CFrame.new(0, 0, -0.300000012, -0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, -1) RightGrip.Parent = RightNunchuckSwirl table.insert(NunchuckSwirls, RightNunchuckSwirl) Debris:AddItem(RightNunchuckSwirl, 5) RightNunchuckSwirl.Parent = Character end for i, v in pairs(NunchuckSwirls) do if v and v.Parent then v.Touched:connect(function(Hit) if Hit and Hit.Parent then local character, humanoid = FindCharacterAncestor(Hit.Parent) if character and character ~= Character and humanoid and humanoid.Health > 0 and Humanoid.Health > 0 then UntagHumanoid(humanoid) TagHumanoid(humanoid, Player) humanoid:TakeDamage(SwingDamage) HitSound:Play() end end end) end end Spawn(function() while RightGrip and RightGrip.Parent do RightGrip.C1 = RightGrip.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, 1) wait() end end) Spawn(function() while LeftGrip and LeftGrip.Parent do LeftGrip.C1 = LeftGrip.C1 * CFrame.Angles(0, 0, -1) wait() end end) SwingSound:Play() if SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Play() end wait(1.5) if LeftNunchuckSwirl and LeftNunchuckSwirl.Parent then LeftNunchuckSwirl:Destroy() end if RightNunchuckSwirl and RightNunchuckSwirl.Parent then RightNunchuckSwirl:Destroy() end if SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Stop() end SwingSound:Stop() Handle.Transparency = 0 AttackReady = true SwingReady = true end) end
function Activated() if Tool.Enabled and SwingReady then Tool.Enabled = false local Time = RunService.Stepped:wait() if (Time - Last_Attack) < 0.2 then DoubleClick() elseif AttackReady then Attack() end Last_Attack = Time Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Equipped(Mouse) Character = Tool.Parent Player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(Character) Humanoid = Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") Tool.Grip = Grips.Hold Damage = BaseDamage if not Character or not Humanoid then return end HoldOutAnim = Humanoid:LoadAnimation(HoldOut) if HoldOutAnim then HoldOutAnim:Play() end Equipped = true if not Tool.Enabled then wait(ReloadTime) Tool.Enabled = true end end
function Unequipped() Equipped = false SpecialActive = false Handle.Transparency = 0 SwingSound:Stop() if SlashAnim then SlashAnim:Stop() end if SwingAnim then SwingAnim:Stop() end if HoldOutAnim then HoldOutAnim:Stop() end if LeftNunchuckSwirl and LeftNunchuckSwirl.Parent then LeftNunchuckSwirl:Destroy() end if RightNunchuckSwirl and RightNunchuckSwirl.Parent then RightNunchuckSwirl:Destroy() end end
Handle.Touched:connect(Blow)
Tool.Activated:connect(Activated) Tool.Equipped:connect(Equipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(Unequipped)
